properties.hint: Should this contact be updated to the Salesforce Sales Cloud?

properties.label: Ns contact internal ID
properties.name: ns_contact_internal_id
properties.hint: If specified, the NetSuite contact will be updated.  Otherwise a new contact will be added.

properties.label: Sfdc contact mailing country code
properties.name: sfdc_contact_mailing_country_code
properties.hint: Mailing Country Code is required to add the mailing address to a NetSuite Contact (will be marked as default billing and shipping address for the NetSuite Contact)

properties.label: Sfdc contact other country code
properties.name: sfdc_contact_other_country_code
properties.hint: Other Country Code is required to add the other address to a NetSuite Contact

block.comment: Only add the address if the country is present

conditions.rhs: duplicate value found: NetsuiteContactId__c duplicates value on record with id

input.PublishingNotes__c: = "Contact could not be synced to NetSuite because this contact (internal id: "+ _('data.workato_list.accumulate_list_items__1.list_items.first.ns_contact_id') +" is already linked to another Salesforce contact (Contact ID: "+_('data.catch.catch__2.message').slice(80,_('data.catch.catch__2.message').length-80) +") . (Last Attempted at " + _('data.workato.job_context.job_created_at').in_time_zone("America/New_York").strftime("%Y-%m-%d %l:%M%P %z") +")"

properties.label: Contact Job Level ID
properties.hint:
Prefix the value with internalid: to pass Internal ID of the record or externalid: to pass External ID of the record.Eg: externalid:50130000000014c.
If no prefix is used, the value will be considered as Internal ID.
